publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7942 George Foulkes: Presiding Officer Should Stand Down—That the Parliament calls on the Rt Hon Alex Fergusson MSP to stand down from the position of Presiding Officer in view of his decision to stand as a party political candidate in the forthcoming parliamentary election and the imminence of that election.

S3M-7942 George Foulkes: Presiding Officer Should Stand Down—That the Parliament calls on the Rt Hon Alex Fergusson MSP to stand down from the position of Presiding Officer in view of his decision to stand as a party political candidate in the forthcoming parliamentary election and the imminence of that election.
